title: Warmup-1
description: Simple warmup problems to get started with basic logic and loops

problems.description: We have two monkeys, a and b, and the parameters aSmile and bSmile indicate if each is smiling. We are in trouble if they are both smiling or if neither of them is smiling. Return true if we are in trouble.
Given two int values, return their sum. Unless the two values are the same, then return double their sum.
Given an int n, return the absolute difference between n and 21, except return double the absolute difference if n is over 21.

We have a loud talking parrot. The "hour" parameter is the current hour time in the range 0..23. We are in trouble if the parrot is talking and the hour is before 7 or after 20. Return true if we are in trouble.

title: String-1
description: Basic string manipulation problems using substring, charAt, and length

title: Array-1
description: Basic array problems involving loops and array manipulation

title: Logic-1
description: Basic boolean logic problems with if/else statements

title: String-2
description: Medium string problems with more complex logic and patterns

title: Array-2
description: Medium array problems with nested loops and complex logic

title: Logic-2
description: Medium boolean logic problems with complex conditions

title: Recursion-1
description: Introduction to recursion with basic recursive problems
